company_name.value: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited

product_uin.description: Unique Identification Number of the product

product_type.description: Type of the insurance product (e.g., Term, ULIP, Endowment)

distribution_channel.description: Distribution channel for the product (e.g., Online, Offline, Online and Offline, Agent)

terminal_illness_benefits.value:
1. The **Death Benefit (DB)** is payable upon the first occurrence of either:

 a. **Death of the Life Assured**

 b. **Diagnosis of Terminal Illness**

2. The policy will terminate upon payment of the **Death Benefit**.

3. For the **Terminal Illness** benefit, a Life Assured is regarded as **Terminally Ill** if diagnosed with a condition likely to lead to death within **6 months**, confirmed by two independent medical practitioners specializing in such illness.
terminal_illness_benefits.description: Details regarding the benefits related to Terminal Illness under the ICICI insurance policy.
chunks:
1. We will pay the Death Beneﬁt (DB) to your nominee/legal heir, on the ﬁrst occurrence of either 
 • Death of the Life Assured, or
 • Diagnosis of Terminal Illness
 The policy will terminate on payment of this beneﬁt. 
Death Beneﬁt shall be payable as follows:

due to an accident within Accidental Death Beneﬁt term, we will pay your nominee/legal heir AD Beneﬁt as lump sum. 
This beneﬁt ensures that you enhance your coverage signiﬁcantly at very affordable rates. The policy will terminate on

a standard life at the time of inception of the policy. The insured life has 
to be less than 50 years of age at the time of opting for this feature. This

assured is only applicable to base death beneﬁt. The ACI Sum Assured 
and ADB Sum Assured will remain unchanged. Total Sum Assured that 
can be increased under this feature cannot exceed the maximum 
additional sum assured mentioned in the table above.

months. The terminal illness must be diagnosed and conﬁrmed by

other_benefits.value:
1. **Additional Benefits**:

 a. **Marriage**: The policy allows an increase in the Sum Assured by **50%** of the original Sum Assured at the time of marriage, with a maximum additional Sum Assured of ₹50,00,000.

 b. **Birth / Legal Adoption of 1st Child**: An increase in the Sum Assured by **25%** of the original Sum Assured is permitted, with a maximum additional Sum Assured of ₹25,00,000.

 c. **Birth / Legal Adoption of 2nd Child**: Similar to the first child, an increase in the Sum Assured by **25%** of the original Sum Assured is allowed, with a maximum additional Sum Assured of ₹25,00,000.

2. **Smart Exit Benefit**: The policyholder can opt for the **Smart Exit Benefit**, which terminates the policy upon payment and extinguishes all benefits and interests under the policy. No additional premium is required to avail this option.

3. **Surrender Benefit**: The policyholder can choose between the **Smart Exit Benefit** or the **Unexpired Risk Premium Value**, but both cannot be availed simultaneously.

4. **Discount on First Year’s Premium**: A discount is offered on the first year’s premium for **Death Benefit**, **Terminal Illness**, and **Waiver of Premium on Permanent Disability**, excluding rider premiums, underwriting extra premiums, and taxes.

death_benefit_payment_option.value:
1. **Death Benefit Payment Options**:

   a. The total amount payable on death or terminal illness will be equal to the **Death Benefit** reduced by any **ACI benefit** paid.

   b. The **Death Benefit** will be paid as a combination of **income** and **lump sum payout options**.

   c. The percentage of the **Death Benefit** to be paid out as **lump sum** is chosen at inception.

   d. The balance **Death Benefit** will be paid out in equal monthly installments in advance, for the chosen **Income Term** at a defined rate of **Death Benefit** as given in the **Income payout option**.

2. **Income Term Wise Benefit Amount Payable**:

   a. For an **Income Term** of 10 years, **10%** of the **Death Benefit** is payable every year.

   b. For an **Income Term** of 20 years, **5%** of the **Death Benefit** is payable every year.

   c. For an **Income Term** of 30 years, **3.33%** of the **Death Benefit** is payable every year.

   d. The **monthly** income payable in advance is:
      - For 10 years: **0.83333%** of the **Death Benefit**
      - For 20 years: **0.41667%** of the **Death Benefit**
      - For 30 years: **0.27778%** of the **Death Benefit**

3. **Lump Sum and Income**:

   a. The **beneficiary** can advance the first year’s income as a **lump sum**.

   b. In such a case, the **monthly income** will start from the subsequent month for the remaining **income term** at a defined rate of the **Death Benefit** amount as specified in the **Income payout option**.

4. Increasing Income: The beneﬁt amount is payable in monthly installments for 10 years starting with 10% of the 
beneﬁt amount per annum in the ﬁrst year. The income amount will increase by 10% per annum simple interest 
every year thereafter. Sum of total monthly beneﬁts payable over 10 years is equal to 145% of the death beneﬁt 
amount reduced by ACI beneﬁt paid, if any.

the Death Beneﬁt  reduced by ACI beneﬁt paid, if any. The Death Beneﬁt will be paid as a combination of income 
and lump sum payout options. The percentage of the Death Beneﬁt to be paid out as lump sum is chosen at 
inception. The balance Death Beneﬁt will be paid out in equal monthly instalments in advance, for the chosen 
Income Term at a deﬁned rate of death beneﬁt as given in option 2 (Income payout option) above.

death_benefits.value:
1. **Death Benefits** for the policy are as follows:

 a. For **Single Pay** option: Higher of:
   - **125% of the Single Premium**
   - **Sum Assured** chosen by you

 b. For **Regular Pay** and **Limited Pay** options: Higher of:
   - **7 times the annualized premium**
   - **105% of the total premiums paid** up to the date of death or diagnosis of terminal illness
   - **Sum Assured** chosen by you

2. **Sum Assured on Death** is determined as:

 a. For **Single Pay**: Higher of **125% of the Single Premium** or **Sum Assured** chosen by you.

 b. For **Regular Pay** and **Limited Pay**: Higher of **7 times the annualized premium**, **105% of the total premiums paid** up to the date of death or diagnosis of terminal illness, or **Sum Assured** chosen by you.

instant_cash_benefit.value:
1. The **Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit (ACI Benefit)** provides an instant cash benefit in the form of a lump sum payment.

2. This benefit covers **34 critical illnesses** and is payable upon the **first occurrence** of any of these illnesses.

3. The ACI Benefit is designed to meet the **financial needs** of the policyholder during a critical illness, irrespective of the actual expenses incurred.

4. It is important to note that the ACI Benefit is **accelerated**, meaning it reduces the **Death Benefit** of the policy by the amount paid out as ACI Benefit.

5. After the payout of the ACI Benefit, the **premium payments** for this benefit will cease.
instant_cash_benefit.description: Details regarding the instant cash benefits available under the ICICI insurance policy.
chunks:
In this option, along with the beneﬁts under the Life Option, you are also covered for the Accelerated Critical Illness 
Beneﬁt (ACI Beneﬁt). The ACI Beneﬁt offers you coverage against 34 critical illnesses. When a major illness strikes, it 
can place a huge burden on your family, not only because of the cost of medical care but also because you may not be 
able to work. To protect you against this, we will pay you the ACI Beneﬁt, as a lump sum to meet your ﬁnancial needs. 
The beneﬁt is payable irrespective of the actual expenses incurred by the policyholder.
This beneﬁt is payable, on ﬁrst occurrence of any of the covered 34 illnesses. The ACI Beneﬁt, is accelerated and not an 
additional beneﬁt which means, the policy will continue with the Death Beneﬁt reduced by the extent of the ACI Beneﬁt 
paid. Premium payment on account of ACI Beneﬁt will cease after payout of ACI Beneﬁt and the future premiums

surrender_benefits.value:
1. **Surrender Value**: 
   a. For **Single Pay policies**: The **Surrender value** is equal to the **unexpired risk premium value** if the policyholder voluntarily surrenders the policy during the policy term. 
   b. **Unexpired risk premium value** calculation: 
      - **Unexpired risk premium value** = 25% X [1 – (Policy Month of surrender – 1)/ (Policy Term X 12)] X Total Premiums Paid.

2. **Limited Pay policies**: 
   a. If one full year’s premium is not paid, the **unexpired risk premium value** = 0. 
   b. If one full year’s premium has been paid, then the **unexpired risk premium value** = 25% X [Number of months for which premiums are paid / (Premium Payment Term X 12)] X [1 – (Policy Month of surrender – 1)/ (Policy Term X 12)] X Total Premiums Paid.

3. **Regular Pay policies**: 
   a. The **unexpired risk premium value** = 0 if any premium installment is not paid within the grace period. 
   b. If the policy lapses and is not revived within the revival period, the surrender value (if applicable) will be computed as on the date of premium discontinuance.
surrender_benefits.description: Details regarding the surrender value and unexpired risk premium for ICICI insurance policy.
chunks:

Surrender
For Single Pay policies, Surrender value equal to unexpired risk premium value will be payable if the policy holder 
voluntarily surrenders the policy during the policy term.
Unexpired risk premium value = 25% X [1 – (Policy Month of surrender – 1)/ (Policy Term X 12)] X Total Premiums Paid.
For unexpired risk premium value for Limited Pay policies & Regular policies, please refer T&C 13.
You have an option to cancel the policy and avail the below beneﬁts:
i. Base Beneﬁt – If this option is exercised, You will receive an amount equal to the Total Premiums Paid* under the Policy; 
ii. Additional Beneﬁt – If this option is availed in the (T-10)th Policy year where T is the Policy Term, then in furtherance to 
 the Base Beneﬁt, You will receive an additional amount equal to the Total Premiums Paid* under the policy. This 
 additional beneﬁt is available only under Limited Pay policies with Premium Payment Terms of 5 years, 7 years, 10

 • Death of the Life Assured, or

In addition to the beneﬁts under the Life Option, you are also covered for Accidental Death (AD) Beneﬁt. In case of death 
due to an accident within Accidental Death Beneﬁt term, we will pay your nominee/legal heir AD Beneﬁt as lump sum.

exit_options.value:
1. **Smart Exit Benefit**:  
   a. This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than 29 but not during the last 5 policy years.  
   b. The age of the life assured must be 60 years or more at the time of exercise.  
   c. The policy must be in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option.  
   d. No claim for any of the underlying benefits can be registered and is under evaluation/accepted/paid/being paid on the policy.  

2. **Unexpired Risk Premium Value**:  
   a. This option is available as per S. No. 13 of Terms & Conditions.  
   b. The policyholder can either opt for **Smart Exit Benefit** or **Unexpired Risk Premium Value**, but not both simultaneously.  

3. **Surrender Benefits**:  
   a. Not applicable as per the query request to exclude surrender benefits.  

4. **Paid-up Value**:  
   a. Not applicable as per the query request to exclude paid-up value.
exit_options.description: Extracted exit values/options/benefits available for the policy as per the query.

approved during revival (following Board Approved 
Underwriting policy) shall be restored.
16. No loans are allowed under this policy.
Loadings for various modes of premium payment are given below
    Mode of Premium Payment Loading (as a % of Premium)
    Monthly   2.5%
    Semi-Annual  1.25%
    Annual   NA
The policy shall terminate on payment of this Smart Exit Beneﬁt (if exercised) and all beneﬁts and interests under 
this policy will stand extinguished. No additional premium is payable to avail this option. 
The policyholder can either opt for Smart Exit Beneﬁt or Unexpired Risk Premium Value as per S. No. 13 of Terms & 
Conditions below i.e. both the Smart Exit Beneﬁt and Surrender Beneﬁt cannot be availed simultaneously. 
A discount as mentioned below will be offered on ﬁrst year’s premium of Death Beneﬁt, Terminal Illness and Waiver 
of Premium on permanent disability (excluding rider premiums, underwriting extra premiums and taxes) to salaried

years and 15 years. For example, if the Premium Payment Term is 10 years, Policy Term is 40 years and cancellation 
 of the policy has been availed in the 30th Policy Year, the policyholder is eligible to receive 200% of Total Premiums 
 Paid* as the total payout upon cancellation.
The Smart Exit Beneﬁt shall become payable subject to the fulﬁllment of all the below mentioned conditions:
• This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than 29 but not during the last 5 policy years.
• The age of the life assured is 60 years or more at the time of exercise.
• The policy is in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option.
• No claim for any of the underlying beneﬁts has been registered and is under evaluation/ or accepted/ or paid/being 
         paid on the policy.
There is no maturity, paid-up value or survival beneﬁt available under this product.       If You are not satisﬁed or have any disagreement with the terms and

exit_option_conditions.value:
1. **Exit Options/Benefits**:

   a. **Smart Exit Benefit**: This option allows the policyholder to terminate the policy and receive a payout, extinguishing all benefits and interests under the policy.

   b. **Unexpired Risk Premium Value**: This option can be availed instead of the Smart Exit Benefit, but both cannot be exercised simultaneously.

2. **Conditions for Exercising Smart Exit Benefit**:

   a. The option can be exercised in any policy year greater than **29** but not during the last **5** policy years.

   b. The age of the life assured must be **60 years or more** at the time of exercising this option.

   c. The policy must be in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option.

   d. No claim for any of the underlying benefits has been registered and is under evaluation, accepted, or paid on the policy.
exit_option_conditions.description: Details regarding exit options and conditions for the ICICI insurance policy.

discount_female.value:
1. **Special premium rates** for **Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit** specifically for women.

2. **15% discount** on premium rates for **life cover (Death Benefit)** as compared to male lives.

3. **Enhanced protection** that includes coverage against **death**, **terminal illness**, and **disability**.

4. **Comprehensive additional benefits** with the option to choose **Accidental Death Benefit** and **Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit**.

5. **Special premium rates** for **non-tobacco users**.
discount_female.description: Discounts and benefits for women in the ICICI insurance policy.
chunks:
Covers female organ cancers such as breast cancer and cervical cancer under Accelerated Critical Illness Beneﬁt
Special premium rates for Accelerated Critical Illness Beneﬁt 
15% discount on premium rates for life cover (Death Beneﬁt) as compared to male lives
Key beneﬁts for women
Enhanced protection: Coverage against death, terminal illness and disability
Comprehensive additional beneﬁts: Option to choose Accidental Death Beneﬁt and Accelerated 
Critical Illness Beneﬁt
Special premium rates for non-tobacco users
Special discount on ﬁrst year’s premium for salaried customers
Need based beneﬁt payout: Choose to receive the beneﬁt amount as a lump sum or as monthly 
income for 10/ 20/ 30 years or a combination of both
Flexibility to pay premiums once, for a limited period or throughout the policy term
Tax Beneﬁts may be applicable on premiums paid and beneﬁts received as per the prevailing tax laws 
Key features

discount_salaried.value:
1. **Salaried Customer Discount**: 
   a. A discount of **15%** is available for customers opting for a sum assured greater than or equal to ₹10,000,000 under the **Limited Pay** option. 
   b. A discount of **10%** is available for customers under the **Regular Pay** option.
discount_salaried.description: Details of discounts available for salaried customers in the ICICI insurance policy.

Total Premiums Paid means the total of all premiums paid under the base product excluding any extra premium and taxes, if 
collected explicitly. 
* For Smart Exit beneﬁt: Where Life Stage Protection options has been exercised, Total Premiums Paid shall include the 
Premiums paid for each tranche of additional sum assured purchased. If You have opted for Accelerated Critical Illness and/ or 
Accidental Death Beneﬁts, for which additional Premiums have been paid, then Total Premiums Paid shall exclude the 
Premium Paid towards such additional beneﬁt(s).
